title: Confused with type anatomy
content:
Can anyone tell me what the circled parts are in this pic? Are they terminals, serifs, tails?  
I'm getting confused with them all :/

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713210559im_/http:/typophile.com/files/let_5101.jpg)
author: DeeUK

comments.content:
That shape is often called "foxtail". You can append "flourish", "terminal", "serif", etc. to it, as you see fit.

hhp
